nodes.beat: Dracula, a powerful Roman senator, is turned into a vampire by a mysterious sorcerer.
Dracula, hiding his new identity, continues his political maneuverings in the Senate.
A young Roman soldier, Lucius, starts suspecting Dracula's strange behavior.
Lucius investigates and discovers Dracula's vampire identity.
Lucius, with the help of a wise oracle, learns how to kill a vampire.
Lucius confronts Dracula in a thrilling battle in the Colosseum.
Lucius kills Dracula, bringing peace back to Rome.
Dracula uses his new powers to control the minds of other senators.
Lucius forms a group of soldiers to fight against Dracula.
The group of soldiers confront Dracula in a massive battle in the Roman Forum.
Lucius and his soldiers manage to defeat Dracula and his mind-controlled senators.
Dracula, a wealthy Roman merchant, is turned into a vampire by a cursed artifact.
Lucius confronts Dracula on a ship in the middle of the Mediterranean Sea.
Lucius kills Dracula, sinking the ship and the cursed artifact to the bottom of the sea.
Dracula uses his new powers to control the minds of other merchants and expand his trade empire.
The group of soldiers confront Dracula in a massive battle in the Roman port of Ostia.
Lucius and his soldiers manage to defeat Dracula and free the mind-controlled merchants.
